text: From www. theblast. com By Daniel Goldblatt Selena Gomez is once again killing ’ em with kindness. The singer made an appearance on Saturday night at the Children ’ s Hospital Orange County ’ s oncology prom event, which supports teens and young adults undergoing cancer treatment as well as post - treatment survivors. Other celebrities at the event included Jack Black and “ Grey ’ s Anatomy ” stars Sarah Drew, James Pickens Jr., Caterina Scorsone and Kevin McKidd.
